titlestmt.titleproper: Finding aid for the Mark Chancellor Stevens diaries

archdesc.bioghist: Born December 17, 1906, died November 19, 1987; Detroit, Michigan, businessman; with Detroit Bank & Trust Company (later Comerica), 1928-1972; Grosse Pointe Farms councilman, 1965-1975; trustee Merrill Palmer Institute, 1967-1975, Children's Home of Detroit, 1974-1987, Elmwood Cemetery, 1946-1987, Detroit Historical Society, 1961-1987 (president, 1969-71); trustee of Mariners Church of Detroit.

archdesc.scopecontent: Diaries detailing daily life, thoughts, business activities, social engagements, and world events.
